footer.tagline: Reliable rides, anytime, anywhere. Your trusted partner for safe and affordable travel.

hero.title: Reliable Taxi Service in Your City
hero.subtitle: Safe, affordable, and comfortable rides — anytime, anywhere.

items.title: Reliable Rides
items.text: Always on time with experienced and courteous drivers.

items.title: Affordable Prices
items.text: Transparent pricing with no hidden charges. Best value for money.

items.title: Safety First
items.text: Clean vehicles with trusted local drivers for your safety.

items.title: Airport Pickup
items.text: On-time pickups and drops at the airport.

items.title: City Rides
items.text: Affordable rides within the city limits.

items.title: Outstation
items.text: Comfortable trips to nearby cities and towns.

hero.title: About Us
hero.subtitle: Your trusted partner for safe, reliable, and affordable taxi rides.

story.title: Our Story
story.text: We started with a simple mission: to make transportation in our city safer, easier, and more affordable. With years of experience in the industry, we’ve built a reputation for reliability and trust. Today, we are proud to serve thousands of happy customers every year.

missionVision.missionText: To provide every customer with a safe, comfortable, and affordable ride experience. We aim to be the most trusted taxi service by putting customer satisfaction at the heart of everything we do.
missionVision.visionText: To redefine local transportation by combining technology with personal care, ensuring convenience, reliability, and comfort for everyone.

hero.title: Contact Us
hero.subtitle: We’re here to help — send us your enquiry today.

places.name: Haldighati
places.desc: A historic mountain pass famous for the Battle of Haldighati (1576) between Maharana Pratap and the Mughal army.

places.name: Kumbhalgarh Fort
places.desc: A UNESCO World Heritage Site with one of the longest walls in the world, built by Rana Kumbha.

places.name: Chittorgarh Fort
places.desc: The largest fort in India, symbol of Rajput pride and sacrifice, known for Rani Padmini's story.

places.name: Mount Abu
places.desc: Rajasthan’s only hill station, known for Nakki Lake, Dilwara Temples and scenic beauty.

places.name: Ranakpur Jain Temple
places.desc: An architectural marvel with 1,444 intricately carved marble pillars, all unique.

places.name: Eklingji Temple
places.desc: A historic temple dedicated to Lord Shiva, highly revered by the Mewar rulers.

places.name: Nathdwara
places.desc: Famous for the Shrinathji Temple, one of the most important pilgrimage sites in Rajasthan.

places.name: Jaisamand Lake
places.desc: The second largest artificial lake in Asia, also known as Dhebar Lake.

places.name: Rajsamand Lake
places.desc: A stunning man-made lake built by Maharana Raj Singh in the 17th century.
